name: Jeannine
text: Great work, MUMmers! What a fun time! Hope there will be more MUMents like that one in the future :0)

name: Kenneth
text: What a great gathering & thanks again for everyone's efforts to create urban art and music spaces in the Boston area - you are much appreciated!

name: Clare Dawn
text: Thanks to everyone who helped put on such an awesome event! Loved the DJs, artists and how many of peeps were there rockin out under McGrath Saturday night! I ? Somerville!

name: Josh
text: This event is why I am proud to live in Somerville..
